verbose_text: As shown in XREF_FIG, arnebin-1 significantly increased the phosphorylation of VEGFR2, FAK, ERK and Src, induced by VEGF (1 ng/ml), in a concentration dependent manner, which suggested that arnebin-1 exerted its pro angiogenic effect by directly targeting VEGFR2 and subsequently activating the VEGFR2 induced downstream signaling cascade.
evidence: phosphorylation of VEGFR2, FAK, ERK and Src, induced by VEGF
